resources.string: Lazy. I don\'t wanna leave my house.
Relaxed, but I\'ll travel a short distance.
Energetic. Reasonable travel is not a problem.
Rich, bored, and fucking stupid. My private jet is fueling as we speak. Anything within 500 miles is too close.

string-array.name: EnergyCriteria
string-array.item: Lazy. I don\'t wanna leave my house.
Relaxed, but I\'ll travel a short distance.
Energetic. Travel is not a problem.
Rich, bored, and fucking stupid. My private jet is fueling as we speak. Anything within 500 miles is too close.

string-array.name: MoneyCriteria
string-array.item: A tight budget, but I gotta eat ($)

string-array.name: HungerCriteria
string-array.item: Ravenous. Pre-Thanksgiving weekend levels of hunger
Not hungry. But I\'m bored and food sounds exciting.
